alert.note: Alert for Central Oregon Cascade Foothills; Willamette National Forest (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 14 at 2:26PM PDT until August 15 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING CONDITIONS CONTINUE THROUGH THIS EVENING AND INTO TUESDAY... .Red Flag Warning Conditions will continue through this evening for the majortity of the forecast area. In addition, Fire Weather Zones 606 and 608 will continue for at least 24 hours as overall conditions are expected to change very little. ...RED FLAG WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PDT TUESDAY FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 606 AND 608... * AFFECTED AREA...In Oregon, Fire Weather Zone 606 Central Oregon Cascade Foothills and Fire Weather Zone 608 Willamette National Forest. * WINDS...Northeast 5 to 10 mph with gusts up to 15 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 18 percent. * INSTABILITY...High haines (values of 5 to 6) indicate unstable air mass, such that strong vertical motion could promote plume dominated fire growth, with enhanced burning on any existing fires as well as any new fire starts. * IMPACTS...Conditions may be favorable for rapid fire spread which may threaten life and property. Use extra caution with potential ignition sources, especially in grassy areas.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of the above conditions can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Central Oregon Cascade Foothills; Willamette National Forest
